solution_line_template: He got {num_days_initial}*{sleep_hours_initial_day}=<<{num_days_initial}*{sleep_hours_initial_day}={sleep_initial_days}>>{sleep_initial_days} hours the first {num_days_initial} days.
The next {num_days_next} days he gets {num_days_next}*{sleep_hours_next_day}=<<{num_days_next}*{sleep_hours_next_day}={sleep_next_days}>>{sleep_next_days} hours.
